scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules services/*/node_modules
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm -C services/supabase dlx supabase db push
scripts.db:reset: pnpm -C services/supabase dlx supabase db reset --force
scripts.functions:deploy: pnpm -C services/supabase dlx supabase functions deploy
scripts.supabase:push: pnpm -C services/supabase dlx supabase db push
scripts.setup:env:
echo 'Creating .env.test file...' && echo 'SUPABASE_URL=your_supabase_url_here
SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=your_supabase_anon_key_here
SUPABASE_DB_SCHEMA=api
APP_ENV=test' > .env.test && echo '.env.test file created! Please update with your actual Supabase credentials.'
